title: Easily Download EconDataverse Datasets
text: ‘EconDataverse’ universe open-source packages work seamlessly economic data. package designed make easy download datasets preprocessed ‘EconDataverse’ packages single step. Learn ‘EconDataverse’ econdataverse.org.

title: Easily Download EconDataverse Datasets
text: can install development version econdatasets GitHub :

title: Easily Download EconDataverse Datasets
text: Use ed_get() load specific table dataset: Use ed_get_tables() see tables available specific dataset: Use ed_get_datasets() view datasets published EconDataverse:
code: library(econdatasets) counterparts <- ed_get("wbids", "counterparts") #> → Reading dataset from #>   https://huggingface.co/datasets/econdataverse/wbids/resolve/main/counterparts.parquet #> ✔ Successfully loaded counterparts from wbids head(counterparts, 5) #>   counterpart_id counterpart_name counterpart_iso2code counterpart_iso3code #> 1            001          Austria                   AT                  AUT #> 2            002          Belgium                   BE                  BEL #> 3            003          Denmark                   DK                  DNK #> 4            004           France                   FR                  FRA #> 5            005          Germany                   DE                  DEU #>   counterpart_type #> 1          Country #> 2          Country #> 3          Country #> 4          Country #> 5          Country ed_get_tables("imfweo") #> → Fetching file tree from #>   https://huggingface.co/api/datasets/econdataverse/imfweo/tree/main?recursive=1 #> ✔ Found 3 Parquet table(s). #>              table                 filename                     path     size #> 1 economic_outlook economic_outlook.parquet economic_outlook.parquet 48413034 #> 2         entities         entities.parquet         entities.parquet     7290 #> 3           series           series.parquet           series.parquet    11779 #>                                                                                          url #> 1 https://huggingface.co/datasets/econdataverse/imfweo/resolve/main/economic_outlook.parquet #> 2         https://huggingface.co/datasets/econdataverse/imfweo/resolve/main/entities.parquet #> 3           https://huggingface.co/datasets/econdataverse/imfweo/resolve/main/series.parquet ed_get_datasets() #> → Fetching dataset list from #>   https://huggingface.co/api/datasets?author=econdataverse #> ✔ Found 2 datasets. #>                dataset total_downloads            last_modified is_private #> 1  econdataverse/wbids              24 2025-10-28T14:57:47.000Z      FALSE #> 2 econdataverse/imfweo               4 2025-11-10T06:05:06.000Z      FALSE #>   is_gated #> 1    FALSE #> 2    FALSE

title: Easily Download EconDataverse Datasets
text: Contributions econdatasets welcome! ’d like contribute, please follow steps: Create issue: making changes, create issue describing bug feature ’re addressing. Fork repository: receiving supportive feedback package authors, fork repository GitHub account. Create branch: Create branch changes descriptive name. Make changes: Implement bug fix feature. Test changes: Run tests ensure changes don’t break existing functionality. Submit pull request: Push changes fork submit pull request main repository.

title: econdatasets: Easily Download 'EconDataverse' Datasets — econdatasets-package
text: 'EconDataverse' universe open-source packages work seamlessly economic data. package designed make easy download selected datasets preprocessed 'EconDataverse' packages single step. Learn 'EconDataverse' https://www.econdataverse.org.

title: econdatasets: Easily Download 'EconDataverse' Datasets — econdatasets-package

what: Get a dataset from EconDataverse Hugging Face repositories — ed_get
title: Get a dataset from EconDataverse Hugging Face repositories — ed_get
text: Downloads reads Parquet file directly EconDataverse Hugging Face datasets using arrow package.

title: Get a dataset from EconDataverse Hugging Face repositories — ed_get
code: ed_get(dataset, table, columns = NULL, quiet = FALSE)

title: Get a dataset from EconDataverse Hugging Face repositories — ed_get
text: dataset Character string naming dataset repository Hugging Face (e.g., "wbids" World Bank Indicators). table Character string naming table. columns Character vector naming columns. Defaults NULL. quiet Logical; suppress messages? Default: FALSE.

title: Get a dataset from EconDataverse Hugging Face repositories — ed_get
Get a dataset from EconDataverse Hugging Face repositories — ed_get
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ df <- ed_get("wbids", "counterparts") head(df)  df <- ed_get(   "wbids",   "counterparts",   columns = c("counterpart_id", "counterpart_name")) } # }

what: List available datasets in the EconDataverse organization — ed_get_datasets
title: List available datasets in the EconDataverse organization — ed_get_datasets
text: Retrieves list datasets published EconDataverse organization Hugging Face.

title: List available datasets in the EconDataverse organization — ed_get_datasets
List available datasets in the EconDataverse organization — ed_get_datasets
text: quiet Logical; whether suppress informational messages. Defaults FALSE.

title: List available datasets in the EconDataverse organization — ed_get_datasets
text: data frame columns: dataset Dataset identifier Hugging Face total_downloads Approximate download count last_modified Last update timestamp (UTC) is_private Logical; whether dataset private is_gated Logical; whether access gated

title: List available datasets in the EconDataverse organization — ed_get_datasets

what: List Parquet tables for a specific EconDataverse dataset — ed_get_tables
title: List Parquet tables for a specific EconDataverse dataset — ed_get_tables
text: Queries Hugging Face Hub returns .parquet files given dataset repository EconDataverse organization, including file sizes.

title: List Parquet tables for a specific EconDataverse dataset — ed_get_tables
List Parquet tables for a specific EconDataverse dataset — ed_get_tables
text: dataset Character; dataset repository name (e.g., "wbids"). quiet Logical; suppress messages? Default: FALSE.

title: List Parquet tables for a specific EconDataverse dataset — ed_get_tables
text: data.frame : table Basename without .parquet extension filename Filename extension path Path within repo size File size url Direct resolve/main URL Parquet file

title: List Parquet tables for a specific EconDataverse dataset — ed_get_tables
